column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient) $5$5$5$helps with neuro pain. I had recently taken myself of Amytripaline as my eye sight was getting very bad. The Clonidine is more effective than Amytripiline. I was surprised. It's been almost 11 years since I've experienced this little pain. I recommend for neuro pain.

55-64 Male  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient) $4$4$5$I have an infusion pump that contains Clondine along with hydromorphone.  Are there any males using the same or at least one of these?  I have a question that only a male could answer.
